CustomField.formula: IMAGE("http://maps.google.com/maps/api/staticmap?center=" + TEXT(Location__Latitude__s) + "," + TEXT(Location__Longitude__s) +"&zoom=16&size=430x300&markers=color:blue|" + TEXT(Location__Latitude__s) + "," + TEXT(Location__Longitude__s) + "&sensor=false&format=png32!" , "Error retrieving map", 300, 430)
CustomField.label: Map
